name: Auto Burger
description:
Sell burgers in an unstable economy where time is money!

How to Play: Touch or Click to switch locations and buy ingredients for your burger machine!

Made using Playground.js (framework) and Inkscape (burger graphics).

Created for the Game Maker's Toolkit Game Jam 2018. My take on the theme: a cooking/restaurant manager game without a stable economy, profits, employees, or personal control over cooking or prices! Basically you have to extract value from the fluctuating ingredient costs in order to survive as long as possible.
